Learning_CatalogObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_CatalogObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_CatalogObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies catalogs using unique references for updates. Leave blank when creating catalog.

Learning_Catalog_Data.description: Unique Learning Catalog Name for the Learning Catalog.

Learning_TopicObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_TopicObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_TopicObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Catalog_Data.description: Learning Topics assigned for the Learning Catalog
Learning Catalog Description for the Learning Catalog.

description: Contains data for the learning catalog, i.e. name, topics, description, & inactive.
